[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Emily_McDonald_Scientific_Recruiter_Massachusetts.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Emily Headshot” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”500ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” z_index_tablet=”500″ use_border_color=”off”]

 

[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” z_index_tablet=”500″ use_border_color=”off”]

Emily McDonald, Account Manager Massachusetts

Emily graduated from the University of New Hampshire in 2019 with a bachelor’s degree in Biomedical Science and Medical Laboratory Science. Shortly after graduating, she joined ClinLab staffing as an entry level recruiter and put her scientific laboratory knowledge, hard work, and perseverance to use. Emily began her recruiting career working under Sean Reilly and with great coaching and development, became one of the top billing recruiters and received the rising star award in 2020.

With her strong work ethic and determination, she has worked her way into an Account Manager role in the Massachusetts division within R&D, quality, operations and manufacturing. Outside of ClinLab, Emily enjoys spending time with friends and family and spending summers at Lake Winnipesaukee.

Massachusetts Offices

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
